name: Verify POST request with valid base URL and valid request body

steps.name: Given  User sets Authorization to No Auth
Given  User sets request for Program module with valid base URL and valid request body
When  User send POST request with mandatory data fields from "ProgramPOSTValidData" and 6
Then  User gets success message with status code "201" in response body with message Program created
